headline: Stay Ahead of the Game With Hilton Worldwide (HLT) Q1 Earnings: Wall Street's Insights on Key Metrics
summary: Besides Wall Street's top -and-bottom-line estimates for Hilton Worldwide (HLT), review projections for some of its key metrics to gain a deeper understanding of how the company might have fared during the quarter ended March 2025.

headline: Pershing Square Holdings Full Year 2024 Letter To Shareholders
summary: In 2024, Pershing Square Holdings generated a solid NAV performance of 10.2%, and a 8.3% total shareholder return. Click here to read the full letter.
